links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
prog: (PARI) contfrac(Pi/exp(1))(PARI) allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 21000); x=contfrac(Pi/exp(1)); for (n=1, 20000, write("b061666.txt", n, " ", x[n])); \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 25 2009
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 16 2001
extensions: Extra comma removed from terms by _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 25 2009
